Headline: #18 16th-18th Temporary Eastbound Reroute near 11th/Michigan
ShortDescription: Eastbound 18 16th-18th buses are temporarily rerouted via Roosevelt, Michigan, 9th, Wabash, and Roosevelt due to, street blockage near 11th/Michigan.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Eastbound #18 16th-18th buses are temporarily rerouted via Roosevelt, Michigan, 9th, Wabash, and Roosevelt due to, street blockage near 11th/Michigan.

Westbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.
